description: Representatives of the 16 countries that make up the peacekeeping force in Lebanon have said the rules of engagement must change in light of Israeli attacks.
title: UN mission in Lebanon needs different rules of engagement

description: With a cholera case confirmed amid Israel's relentless bombing of Lebanon, the World Health Organisation  fears the disease could easily spread.
title: Cholera confirmed in Lebanon, risk of spread 'very high': WHO

description: In a widening dispute, France has banned Israeli firms from participating in a naval arms show next month due to Israeli conduct in Gaza and Lebanon.
title: France bans Israeli firms from exhibiting at naval arms show

description: The Israeli military has reportedly begun dropping reservists who signed a letter threatening to quit of the government didn't reach a captive deal with Hamas
title: Israel suspends reservists over Gaza captive deal statement

description: Canada, in collaboration with the United States, has classified the Palestinian organisation Samidoun as a "terrorist entity".
title: What is Samidoun, the Palestinian group banned by Canada, the US

description: In-depth: An estimated 17,000 children are thought to have been orphaned during Israel's war on Gaza, creating another generation traumatised by war.
title: Israel's war on Gaza has created a generation of orphans

description: After being under construction for over a decade, the Grand Egyptian Museum will open some of its halls and display over 100,000 artefacts.
title: Museum showing Egypt's ancient treasures to open for a trial run

description: A US court has given two Saudi officials until November to hand over evidence in a lawsuit about an assassination plot of a former senior intelligence official.
title: US court gives Saudi November deadline to hand over evidence

description: The footage shared online has drawn scepticism and ridicule, with observers highlighting that the claims echo earlier ones made in Gaza.
title: Israel churns out 'proof' of gaining ground in Lebanon assault

description: As the region awaits for a possible Israeli attack on Iran, Qatar has warned against using an airbase in the emirate to launch an assault on 'any country'
title: Qatar suggests Al-Udeid base cannot be used to attack Iran

description: Shai Davidai had previously been denied access to the Columbia University campus after he said he would disrupt a pro-Palestine encampment.
title: Shai Davidai suspended from Columbia U campus for harassment

description: Sources say Israel may be preparing to expand its ground invasion of Lebanon with its troops removing mines and engineering works in the occupied Golan Heights.
title: Israel clears Golan of landmines to prepare assault on Hezbollah

description: In-depth: As Israel's war expands, Netanyahu has issued Lebanon a chilling threat: rise against Hezbollah and risk civil war or be destroyed like Gaza.
title: Civil war or Gaza 2.0: Is Netanyahu working to divide Lebanon?

description: The New York Times has issued a statement on an article detailing the experiences of doctors in Gaza, after pro-Israel voices spread theories on social media.
title: NYT rebuts claims of 'fake images' of Gaza children shot in head

description: It offers a close up look at the impact of the war on Palestinians and stands in contrast to mainstream reports which have failed to convey the human cost.
title: New BBC documentary shows life under Israeli bombs in Gaza

description: Keir Starmer says his government is considering sanctions against far-right Israeli ministers Itamar Ben Gvir and Bezalel Smotrich.
title: UK mulls sanctions on Israeli ministers Ben Gvir, Smotrich

description: Hundreds gathered last week outside the British Parliament to mark one year of Gaza genocide and demand the UK government adopt 8 October as Gaza Memorial Day.
title: Palestine activists urge 8 October declared 'Gaza Memorial Day'

description: "I want to die in my home, and I don't want to leave, and if we leave, we won't survive either [...] So let our death be honourable..."
title: Why are Jabalia's residents refusing to evacuate their homes?

description: The strikes resulted in the deaths of four ISIS militants, including a key leader whose identity was not disclosed, the Iraqi Joint Operations Command said.
title: Iraqi airstrikes kill four ISIS militants in Kirkuk

description: As Israel wages its war on Gaza and Lebanon, leaders from the European Union and the Gulf states are meeting in an inaugural summit.
title: EU and Gulf leaders meet for first summit amid Israel's wars

description: The Israeli military says it has captured Hezbollah fighters, as the group threatens to intensify attacks on the northern Israeli port city of Haifa
title: Israel strikes Beirut, kills mayor in southern Lebanon

description: A press tour organised by the Israeli army in south Lebanon drew ire from Hezbollah this week. It has posed questions about journalist work ethics, and safety
title: Lebanon: BBC slammed after embedding reporters with Israeli army

description: Book Club: Historian Adam Raz's 'Loot' reveals how Palestinians were systematically robbed during the 1948 War, linking this theft to their expulsion from homes
title: Adam Raz's Loot exposes Israel's theft of Palestinian property

description: Book Club: In 'No One Knows Their Blood Type' Jumana grapples with life after learning her Palestinian father may not be her biological parent
title: The battle of identity & truth in No One Knows Their Blood Type

description: France's Macron reminded Benjamin Netanyahu that he 'mustn't forget his country created by UN decision'.
title: French PM reminds Netanyahu Israel was created by UN decision

description: Following the deportations and mistreatment, in 2020 Greek authorities granted the man refugee status after processing his claim.
title: ECHR rules against Greece, Germany, over Syrian asylum treatment

description: Ministry of Health's assistant undersecretary Dr Abdel-Latif Al-Hajj noted that women and children amount to 60 percent of the dead and 70 percent of wounded.
title: Gaza's doctors are trying to preserve Palestinian genealogy

description: Writing on X, Jemima Goldsmith voices concerns about the welfare of her ex-husband, Imran Khan, who is in prison after being charged with leaking state secrets.
title: Jemima Goldsmith concerned for ex-husband Imran Khan in jail

description: Footage circulating on the social media platform X has sparked outrage after showing an Israeli soldier carrying the minaret of a mosque that was destroyed.
title: Israeli forces seize minaret after destroying mosque in Jabalia

description: Analysis: In anticipation of a full-scale Iran-Israel war, Gulf states are opting for diplomacy and engagement over confrontation and military escalation.
title: How Gulf states are responding to the Iran-Israel conflict

description: Iran warned the top UN chief of a 'decisive' response if Israel strikes the country in retaliation for a missile attack on 1 October.
title: Iran warns of 'decisive' response if Israel strikes

description: The renewed offensive on Jabalia and other parts of northern Gaza comes as Israel attempts to forcibly displace around 400,000 Palestinians from the area.
title: Gaza medics urge passage for aid amid crippling Israeli siege

description: Keir Starmer's continued commitment to selling UK arms to Israel following the deadly attacks on Lebanon shows there is no red line, argues Daniel Lindley.
title: Starmer's government is morally bankrupt when it comes to Israel

description: Israel is banking on unconditional US military support to engage with Iran. But Iran's strategic assets may be deeper than anticipated, writes Emad Moussa.
title: Israel's fated showdown with Iran is a gamble that will backfire

description: Six people were killed after an Israeli airstrike targeted buildings in the southern city of Nabatiyeh, including its mayor.
title: Six killed in southern Lebanon as north Gaza siege continues

description: For the first time in almost a week, Israeli strikes hit the southern suburbs of Beirut while Israel's Prime Minister vowed against a ceasefire in Lebanon.
title: Israel renews strikes on Beirut as Netanyahu vows 'no ceasefire'

description: Netanyahu told France’s Macron that he was against a unilateral ceasefire, as Israel continued to pound areas across Lebanon and Gaza.
title: Netanyahu against ‘unilateral ceasefire’ as Lebanon bombed

description: Hundreds of women have taken to the streets in major cities across Turkey over the past 10 days to denounce a string of killings of women.
title: Body of missing student found as Turkey grapples with femicides

description: The UN special envoy for Yemen warned the country could be dragged further into regional conflict, calling on the Houthis to stop targeting shipping vessels.
title: UN says Yemen risks being dragged into regional war
